00049 integer::integer(const integer& b) {
00050     if (b.is_nan()) data=0;
00051     else _init(b);

00098 void integer::_init(detail::digit_t init) {
00099     try {
00100         data=new detail::data_t(init);
00101     } catch (std::bad_alloc&) {
00102         throw xint::overflow_error("Out of memory allocating xint::integer");
00103     }
00104     _attach();
00105 }
00106 
00107 void integer::_init(const integer &c) {
00108     #ifdef XINT_DISABLE_COPY_ON_WRITE
00109         data=(c.data ? new detail::data_t(c.data) : 0);
00110     #else
00111         data=c.data;
00112     #endif
00113     _attach();
00114 }
00115 
00116 void integer::_init(boost::uintmax_t n) {
00117     static int bits=std::numeric_limits<boost::uintmax_t>::digits;
00118     static int maxDigits=(bits+detail::bits_per_digit-1)/detail::bits_per_digit;
00119 
00120     try {
00121         data=new detail::data_t;
00122     } catch (std::bad_alloc&) {
00123         throw xint::overflow_error("Out of memory allocating xint::integer");
00124     }
00125     _attach();
00126 
00127     data->alloc(maxDigits);
00128     for (int x=0; n != 0; ++x) {
00129         data->digits[x]=detail::digit_t(n & detail::digit_mask);
00130         n >>= detail::bits_per_digit;
00131     }
00132     data->skipLeadingZeros();
00133 }
00134 
00135 void integer::_attach() {
00136     if (data) data->attach();
00137 }
00138 
00139 void integer::_detach() {
00140     if (data && data->detach()) delete data;
00141 }
00142 
00143 void integer::_make_unique() {
00144     try {
00145         if (data && data->mCopies > 1) {
00146             detail::data_t *newstore=new detail::data_t(data);
00147             _detach();
00148             data=newstore;
00149             _attach();
00150         }
00151     } catch (std::bad_alloc&) {
00152         throw xint::overflow_error("Out of memory allocating xint::integer");
00153     }
00154 }
00155 
00156 void integer::_set_negative(bool negative) {
00157     if (negative != (sign() < 0)) *this=negate(*this);
00158 }
00159 
00164 bool integer::odd() const {
00165     _throw_if_nan();
00166     return ((_get_digit(0) & 0x01)==1);
00167 }
00168 
00173 bool integer::even() const {
00174     _throw_if_nan();
00175     return ((_get_digit(0) & 0x01)==0);
00176 }
00177 
00183 int integer::sign() const {
00184     _throw_if_nan();
00185     if (data->mIsNegative) return -1;
00186     if (_get_length()==1 && _get_digit(0)==0) return 0;
00187     return 1;
00188 }
00189 
00196 bool integer::is_nan() const {
00197     return (data==0);
00198 }
00199 
00205 size_t integer::hex_digits() const {
00206     _throw_if_nan();
00207     size_t bits=log2(*this);
00208     return (bits+3)/4; // Four bits per hex digit, rounded up
00209 }

00211 integer& integer::operator+=(const integer& addend) {
00212     if ((sign() < 0) == (addend.sign() < 0)
00213         && data->mLength >= addend.data->mLength)
00214     {
00215         // Fast in-place add
00216         _make_unique();
00217         data->add(addend.data);
00218     } else {
00219         // This works for all cases
00220         *this=add(*this, addend);
00221     }
00222     return *this;
00223 }
00224 
00225 integer& integer::operator-=(const integer& subtrahend) {
00226     if (sign() >= 0 && subtrahend.sign() >= 0 && *this >= subtrahend) {
00227         // Fast in-place subtract
00228         _make_unique();
00229         data->subtract(subtrahend.data);
00230     } else {
00231         // This works for all cases
00232         *this=subtract(*this, subtrahend);
00233     }
00234     return *this;
00235 }

00237 integer& integer::operator=(const integer &c) {
00238     _detach();
00239     #ifdef XINT_DISABLE_COPY_ON_WRITE
00240         data=(c.data ? new detail::data_t(c.data) : 0);
00241     #else
00242         data=c.data;
00243     #endif
00244     _attach();
00245     return *this;
00246 }

00248 integer& integer::operator*=(const integer& b) { *this=multiply(*this, b); return *this; }
00249 integer& integer::operator/=(const integer& b) { *this=divide(*this, b); return *this; }
00250 integer& integer::operator%=(const integer& b) { *this=mod(*this, b); return *this; }

00252 integer& integer::operator++() { *this += one(); return *this; }
00253 integer& integer::operator--() { *this -= one(); return *this; }
00254 integer  integer::operator++(int) { integer s=*this; *this += one(); return s; }
00255 integer  integer::operator--(int) { integer s=*this; *this -= one(); return s; }

00257 integer  integer::operator<<(size_t shift) const { return shift_left(*this, shift); }
00258 integer  integer::operator>>(size_t shift) const { return shift_right(*this, shift); }
00259 integer& integer::operator&=(const integer& n) { *this=bitwise_and(*this, n); return *this; }
00260 integer& integer::operator|=(const integer& n) { *this=bitwise_or(*this, n); return *this; }
00261 integer& integer::operator^=(const integer& n) { *this=bitwise_xor(*this, n); return *this; }
00262 
00263 integer& integer::operator<<=(size_t shift) {
00264     if (shift>0) {
00265         _make_unique();
00266         data->shift_left(shift);
00267     }
00268     return *this;
00269 }
00270 
00271 integer& integer::operator>>=(size_t shift) {
00272     if (shift>0) {
00273         _make_unique();
00274         data->shift_right(shift);
00275     }
00276     return *this;
00277 }

00279 const integer& integer::zero() {
00280     if (cZero.get()==0) cZero.reset(new integer(0));
00281     return *cZero;
00282 }
00283 
00284 const integer& integer::one() {
00285     if (cOne.get()==0) cOne.reset(new integer(1));
00286     return *cOne;
00287 }

00289 detail::digit_t integer::_get_digit(size_t index) const {
00290     return data->digits[index];
00291 }
00292 
00293 detail::digit_t integer::_get_digit(size_t index, bool) const {
00294     if (index >= data->mLength) return 0;
00295     return data->digits[index];
00296 }
00297 
00298 size_t integer::_get_length() const {
00299     return data->mLength;
00300 }

00302 void integer::_throw_if_nan() const {
00303     if (is_nan()) throw not_a_number();
00304 }
